definition: old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: It's not entirely serious, even as it declares its seriousness.
sentences.chinese: 這本並不像它所申明的那樣，完全是嚴肅的。

sentences.english: Affirm that no matter what you will not backslide into your old bad habit patterns.
sentences.chinese: 申明無論怎樣你不會倒退到舊惡習貴模式。

sentences.english: A workshop manual give diagram and instructions for repair your car.
sentences.chinese: 維修手冊可向您提供修理汽車所需的圖表和申明。

sentences.english: I must say that articles like these bruise my ego a bit.
sentences.chinese: 我必須申明這類文章打擊了我的自我價值觀。

sentences.english: I hereby verify that the above information is true and correct.
sentences.chinese: 我在此申明以上資料全屬事實。

sentences.english: We have got to say that it will never happen again.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須申明，這種事再也不能發生了。

sentences.english: I. I declare that I am not married.
sentences.chinese: 我鄭重申明我現在是單身狀態。

sentences.english: The implication of its statement was to give the immigrants an implicit threat.
sentences.chinese: 這項申明的含意是要給移民一個不言明的恐嚇。

sentences.english: You simply state the dependency in the code.
sentences.chinese: 只需在代碼中申明依賴關係。

sentences.english: But I state these points above as a disclaimer.
sentences.chinese: 這些論點算是我的免責申明。

sentences.english: Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman Ma Zhaoxu made the announcement here on Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 外交部發言人馬朝旭本週三發表申明。
在此我得申明幾個警告。

sentences.english: "Shengming Pavilion" is the witness of controlling on the villagers by the patriarchal clan system.
sentences.chinese: 村中的“申明亭”是宗法制度管理村民方式的見證。

sentences.english: There was one assailable point in this statement.
sentences.chinese: 這個申明中有一點是有隙可乘的。

sentences.english: In the end, nearly everyone benefits from overbooking.
sentences.chinese: 最後要申明的是，幾乎所有人都從超額預定中受益。

sentences.english: It was seen, correctly, as a statement of intent.
sentences.chinese: 那被看做是，完全正確，一份意向申明。

definition: clear (of liquid)/limpid/to clarify/to make sth clear/to be clear (about the facts)
to settle (of liquid)/to become clear (by precipitation of impurities)/precipitate (chemistry)/to put in order/to quell disturbances
